files.patch:
@@ -68,0 +68,5 @@
+#ifndef LINUX
+// Stubbed out for OSX
+inline bool os::can_trim_native_heap() { return false; }
+#endif // LINUX
+

@@ -705,0 +705,6 @@
+#ifdef WINDOWS
+# define BUFSIZE unsigned
+#else
+# define BUFSIZE size_t
+#endif // !WINDOWS
+
@@ -708,2 +714,1 @@
-    // using ssize_t fails the build on Windows
-    long r = (long) ::read(fd, dest + rd, n - rd);
+    ssize_t r = ::read(fd, dest + rd, (BUFSIZE)(n - rd));
